about:
Hi! I am Souvik Sardar a Game Programmer with a passion for the industry, I bring years of experience developing games since high school.
 I have a strong foundation in programming languages such as C#, C++ with a focus on gameplay programming.
I am experienced with Cocos2d-x and Unity game engine with emphasis on Design Patterns have a deep understanding of game development fundamentals.
I have published 10 games, including 4 games which are available on the Play Store.
 In my free time I like to tinker with frameworks like Urho3D, Raylib and others.
